website_summaries.verdict: One of the few steering wheel spinners designed specifically for marine use.
pros: Aluminum construction is weather and water resistant to increase durability for use on lakes
The mounting ring is just the right size for most boat steering wheels
cons: Too small and awkward to use comfortably in cars and trucks compared to other spinners

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the other reviews steer you away from this item. (See what I did there?) It’s heavy, sturdy, does not slip. If your looking for a baseball sized knob, this is NOT for you. I prefer the 2 fingers over but can rest the palm on top as well kind of grip. I’m happy with the purchase, the last brand I had came loose more often than I’d care to mention and also rusted apart from the salt water in less than a year. So far so good with this one, the quality is there. Give it a go.
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Read the warning in the discription before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Did not fit my round 1" wheel on a Montauk 17. Description says its for an oval shaped wheel. I didn't read the warning in the description. It took me about an hour to reshape with a two large locking plyers. It's not perfect but it works. Also, the slot that is supposed to fit into the spoke was to narrow as well and did not fit as it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fischer

customer_reviews.title: This knob is very nicely done. Beautiful polished finish
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this on my 1800CC bay boat's spoked wheel. The clamp is formed to fit an oval wheel ring. Mine is perfectly round so I had to reshape the lower clamp arm a little with a couple pars of pliers then it fit perfectly around my wheel ring. This knob is very nicely done. Beautiful polished finish, nice spinning action, no slop or wobble. Honestly I didn't expect much for 13 bux but was very surprised by the weight and solid sturdiness. Dramatically improves maneuvering ease. Will never boat without one again. I highly recommend this item and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lectricman

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting my boat in and out of the slip.  Nut loosened up from vibration
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. Makes getting my boat into the slip much easier (no more crazy lock-to-lock turns with one hand trying to back in.) My only complaint is that it fell off this season after about a month or two from vibrations. The nut loosened up. I'll put it back on now that the season is over and I'll use a lock nut and maybe some loctite product on the bolt as well. Otherwise, looks nice and works smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: FireMedic

customer_reviews.title: SOLID.
customer_reviews.text: pretty sturdy. seems to be completely made of metal. if there is plastic, then i must’ve missed it. one semi-complaint: the nut you tighten the clamp with constantly comes loose unless you really get at it with an actual wrench. the one that comes with it kind of sucks. another thing: this won’t fit on your average car steering wheel unless you do some irreversible modifications. (like cutting a bunch of the foam grip off the wheel) definitely worth it on an older car though.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, Stainless Steel Steering Knob. After losing lower-quality knobs due to rust in the past, this stainless knob was the right answer. It is low-profile and has a nice fit to the hand when using it. Because it is low-profile, it's a bit of a chore to install (the included wrench is useless), but once installed, it turned out to be just what I wanted! Highly recommended for any vessel where fast turning maneuvers are needed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: I personally like the smaller size knob as the boat I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit boat steering wheel perfectly. I personally like the smaller size knob as the boat I bought it for is only a 19' center console. So it isn't in the way when moving around in a smaller boat. Probably will go for the bigger size for my larger 23' boat as it has more room around console. I put extra lub around the bolt before installing since others mentioned a squeaky sound when turning. Maybe that will avoid that problem ahead of time. Will update review is that doesn't solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mudhen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at the quality for the price. It's a solid chunk of 316 stainless. I have a Mako 18LTS. It has a Baystar helm with a five spoke stainless wheel. The wheel has a flattened cross section: just over an inch front to back, just under 3/4" vertically. This knob is an absolutely perfect fit. Went on in two minutes, very secure, makes docking maneuvers a breeze. Don't buy this and expect it to fit a thick steering wheel without reworking the bracket. But if you have a boat with a wheel 1" or so, this is the knob.
customer_reviews.author: YOUR PUBLIC NAME

customer_reviews.title: no way this will fit 1" diameter
customer_reviews.text: inside measurements at most 3/4" and it don't spread any
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Perfect Size"
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many steering balls over the years for various machines. This one is by far the best value. My only wish is that they make a bigger one to fit on my truck, but perfect for my center console fishing machine. Installed in 30 seconds with a ratchet. Solid, heavy, and snug. It doesn't get much better.
customer_reviews.author: Double "R" Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Was kinda difficult to get a good fit on a standard Stainless Destroyer type boat wheel. Could NOT tighten the thing up to prevent wobble on its stud. Overall, I’m sure better are available but I had to bend and deform mine to make it kinda fit. And then I couldn’t return it.....
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit Marine Steering Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Would not fit my boat's steering wheel. Says it fit up to 1", my steering wheel is 1", but it doesn't fit. While trying to align the 2 clamps, one of the clamps bent and would not allow the threaded base of the knob to align with the hole of the other clamp. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.author: duffyad14

customer_reviews.title: Might need modification
customer_reviews.text: This fit very tightly on a 2018 Boston Whaler steering wheel. Some bending was necessary to get everything lined up. It will likely scratch the steering wheel but for now it works fine. Smaller than the knobs on my tractors but that is OK for a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D

customer_reviews.title: simple - perfectly sized for the stainless steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: Whatever size Grady white uses for a steering wheel - this thing fits perfectly. The way it uses one of the spokes to secure the position as well as the nylon lock nut are great examples of attention to detail. It's very useful when docking.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Fever "Mitch"

customer_reviews.title: It's small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than it looks, almost like you can only use two fingers to use it. Worked and functions decent for its size though. Had to make some adjustments to get it to fit my thicker plastic mower wheel because I wasn't going to put it on my boat once I realized it was so small.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Grundon

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy knob for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy knob that’s a good value for money. Took some work to alter the bracket to fit my wheel. The wheel is 1” but there’s a rubber cover making it a tad larger. This should fit a 1” wheel just fine, but I didn’t want to cut the rubber on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the knob onto my steering wheel for a 2008 triumph center console. I wanted an all chrome knob purely based on preference so decided to chose this one. A tad bit small for my liking but then again I could have read the description a bit better so no fault to the seller on that. Connects via one bolt on the bottom with the tool provided with purchase. Curious to see the long term sturdiness of it once it’s been exposed to salt water for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Marc T

customer_reviews.title: Mount is tiny.
customer_reviews.text: The mount is designed for a boat an ant would drive. This mount is tiny, no way it’s designed for regular marine-type steering wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small for normal steeering wheels
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2008 Crestliner and thought this would fit, however, it is way too small in diameter and had to be bent out to fit plus buying longer bolts. Not worth the headache
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny knob
customer_reviews.text: Very tiny knob I thought i could use this in my freightliner but i cant Must be for children Does not fit in my palm. Have to send it back!! Oh well
customer_reviews.author: UNCLE MUDDY

customer_reviews.title: Fits very snug, Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect on my stainless steering wheel. I have no coating on the steering wheel and it is the standard 5 spoke style Marine Wheel. It clamps on very tightly and looks very nice. It is somewhat small in diameter but I didn't want a huge knob sticking off the wheel. I sticks out about 2 inches off the wheel and makes whipping the boat around a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read before purchasing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Says fits 1” wheel. Not even close. 3/4 prob the biggest that will fit. Great quality to bad it won’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: J Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: Is hard to keep in steering wheel it keeps popping off
customer_reviews.author: Martin family

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This Knob was a pain in the backside to install. I had to do a ton of manipulating for it to fit. Maybe it will work better for the next person. Works good after installation but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: j walker

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17OS Cape Horn. It fit the steering wheel perfectly. I used a little electrical tape underneath it to avoid any type of slipping. So far so good. Definitely helps out if you dont have hydraulic steering.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: It does not fit . Maybe a stainless wheel
customer_reviews.text: This thing will only fit a skinny stainless steering wheel or some kid toy. Don’t listen to any of those other reviews about doing this or to make it fit. It would make one hell of a weapon to knock a knot on someone’s head. Find another knob👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product, easy to install and is invaluable for ...
customer_reviews.text: nice product, easy to install and is invaluable for trolling when I need to keep 1 hand on the wheel and the other hand often trying to set marks on the plotter or retrace steps to a nearby mark that I want to troll over.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J.

customer_reviews.title: Bracket did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid but it does not spin smoothly. Concerned that it will only become less smooth over time. The bracket did not fit on my stainless steering wheel due to the diameter and that it has indentations for finger grips. I was able to use it by drilling a 5/16 hole through one of the flat spokes of the steering wheel and bolting it on without the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Sneaky Pete

customer_reviews.title: Solid built speedknob.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Boston Whaler. Very solid, a little on the small side, but does not get in the way of normal steering, or walking between seat and wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C

customer_reviews.title: May require 'fitting' to the steering wheel...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not a perfect fit, is an add on device. May require bending the collar to fit to the shape of your steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Suicide knob for steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: Only problem doesn’t fit my steering only will fit a stainless steering wheel wasn’t paying attention when I ordered iy
customer_reviews.author: bassinflats

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as most you may see on a boat, but this is big enough, easy to install, and works perfectly for my 20ft WA
customer_reviews.author: Adam Durrette

customer_reviews.title: Bracket is too small for my boat steering wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely too small for any of my steering wheels. The knob is is small but will work if I can reshape the mounting bracket. Might try to use it on my lawn tractor since it won’t fit on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: World of difference in steering
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't too hard to install.. but you had work with it to mold the bottom to the steering wheel then put the top on like a strap.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Small,all metal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my boat steering wheel. Especally when picking up crab nets that requires constant maneuvering in rough water.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure, but now convinced!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure this would fit my needs on our pontoon, basically because of the size. But having had it for a few weeks and many trips around the lake, I love it. Had to do a little adjustment to get it to fit the steering wheel, but all is good and it is doing the job!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. For my gheenoe lt25 steering wheel flawlessly. The knob is a little shaky..... but has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Thank You For Being Useful

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: We have a Sea star hydraulic steering on the boat and you really got a spin that wheel so this came in handy
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described but not easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not easy but once installed, works great. It's little bit on small side, but fits good in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: daniel hong

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit our Whaler
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit a 15’ 2005 Boston Whaler. Does not have a metal steering wheel so it doesn’t fit around.
customer_reviews.author: mideco

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify mounting bracket a bit to work but other than that feels great and functions flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: You want this on your SS spoked wheel
customer_reviews.text: I had to bend it a little during the install, but once tightened up it looks great and spins free. Very strong, use with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller and less substantial that appears in description. And will not fit steering wheels of most John Deere tractors. While apparently well made, it had a very limited range of figment.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. I put this on my 25 foot Carolina Skiff and absolutely love it. All stainless steel with no plastic parts to break .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Was just what I needed for making quick turns for docking and trolling. Mount was easy, though my wheel was a little larger than the prescribed "fit" diameter. A little tweaking during install took care of that. Works fine so far this season. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: Solid ball. Great quality. A little smaller diameter than the one I had but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on center console boat wheel . iteam is well made
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Way to Small
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how small the knob is. It is too small for me to grab it properly. I will need to return it. Other than that the quality seemed good.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzylogic

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I spent 30 minutes trying to get this to fit. Keeps popping out. Not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: RussellTop Contributor: Metal Detecting

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my stainless steering wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I saw no max wheel thickness listed- This does not go around my stainless wheels with the under-finger pattern, about a 1/4" short.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hungus

customer_reviews.title: Great part for a great price !
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my boats stearing ! Great quality and super simple to install !
customer_reviews.author: james johnston

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for any but the thinnest steering wheel. mounting diameter is about 3/4 inch max.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the knob.
customer_reviews.text: Works nice just wish the handle spun a little smoother. It spins but not like a bearing spinner handle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rhein

customer_reviews.title: Great Spinner Knob.
customer_reviews.text: Helpful when docking. Helps turn the steering wheel quickly, and it's small enough that it doesn't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 19' Carolina Skiff Flats boat.. Works awesome! Much easier navigating tree limb filled rivers and even loading boat onto the trailer
customer_reviews.author: Byron Wells

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a steering wheel small enough to fit the size of this ball. It is too small to fit any steering wheel on the market. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Not for round wheels
customer_reviews.text: Not for round steering wheels, I had to modify it to fit a circle. Its shape clamps to oval.
customer_reviews.author: nurse_d

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for something better
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit big Riggs so don't bother, go with something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suiside Knob
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product. It doesn't fit on my golf cart or my car. Made for a very narrow steering wheel. I will find a use for it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: ... our Reinell steering a Yamaha 225 and it works fine. Small diameter
customer_reviews.text: We have this mounted in our Reinell steering a Yamaha 225 and it works fine. Small diameter, but, the size keeps it out of the way of the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Double H Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit out of the box had to modify to make work.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Wallace

customer_reviews.title: changed from previous review.
customer_reviews.text: Steering knob did not fit my boat or it would have been five stares, but, company is very accommodating to help with a bigger replacement or refund my money. However, the product seem to be very well made and would have worked nicely is it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fits excellent on my 88 f150. Wish It came with a small piece of rubber to protect steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Gbear LaGorilla

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Made for a pretty small wheel. Luckily my wheel is plastic and I was able to grind it down a bit, to make it work
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Make your boat high performance handling for just a few dollars.  Its great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I installed it on my 17 ft. Boston Whaler , Montauk, and it is really the finishing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: It would not fit the steering wheel of my Kubota L245DT.
customer_reviews.author: Achilleas T.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but it works
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to install. If your steering wheel has any mass to it at all you're going to have a hard time. Jaws are not round, but v-shaped. Knob does not spin freely at first but eventually loosens up. If you're expecting ball-bearing smoothness look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to dimensions - smaller than we thought!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than we thought, but heavy & well-made. Great for the boat steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: brocksgirl98

customer_reviews.title: Great finish great price.. make sure you have the right diameter/thickness steering wheel stoc
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish. Great stainless steel addition to any steering wheel. Small diameter wheel fits better.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Not universal
customer_reviews.text: Had to make some alterations to fit standard marine steering wheel
customer_reviews.author: Bob L

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the size
customer_reviews.text: This is for a very skinny steering wheel. I had to drill a hole to make it work on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price, buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Second one I have purchased. Solid construction (heavy) with good shape mounting bracket that fits variety of wheel shapes. Have one on my dinghy and one on my Kubota
customer_reviews.author: Curt L.

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, use it on our CFD fire boat
customer_reviews.author: CFD Ex-Chief

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great the one i had on my boat was stolen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little rough in  the smoothness
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth one I have purchased either for myself or as a gift. this particular one was the least expensive but did not roll as smooth as the others I am not sure if they were all the same brand but they look identical
customer_reviews.author: Mike VB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, as a commercial fishermen, its valuable to be able to turn quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Great for any commercial fishermen that needs to have a quick turn to retrieve a crab pot buoy or for docking..
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just a little to small of a knob wish it was a little bigger but other than that great knob
customer_reviews.author: kevin h.

customer_reviews.title: Great for salt water
customer_reviews.text: Two years no rust ,still rolls smooth great for my center console I stand hold knob with one hand throttle with the outher

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected. Very happy with the product and the seller
customer_reviews.author: RCJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a 316 SS knob
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Make sure you have the narrow width wheel without the finger grooves and it will fit fine. If you have the finger grooves some modification will be necessary.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted.fitted perfect on my steering wheel.nice and tight fit.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I should of paid attention to the size.. it didn’t fit my boat steering wheel. Too small! 😔

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to bend the clamp to fit my boat steering wheel.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and looks stock on my boat
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve got this earlier! Perfect fit and looks stock on my boat.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy & feels smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy & feels durable. Haven’t been able to install it yet because my forklift has different threads on the built-in steering wheel bracket. It is small but I think it wouldn’t be a problem to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very small, didn't fit my wheel
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit my steering wheel. 2018 Scout 175 Dorado sport. It's very small. Even if it fit I'm not sure I'd like how small it is.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but must have something to wrap around the main wheel so as not to scratch.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but didn't fit my boat
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very easy to mount. But, it doesn't fit my Yamaha Jet boat steering wheel.

customer_reviews.title: Think this would be excellent for a boat
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would work on one of my pick ups, but would not work on either one. Unfortunately, I let my return time frame get away from me.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Mac

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one is great and is easy to turn and one is difficult to turn....a bit sticky.
customer_reviews.author: keith ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my steering wheel and cost to return is too much.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my steering wheel. To return the product back to seller cost more than half of the entire cost of the product. Not worth returning. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Tiny tiny tiny! Won’t fit a 22’ bay boat wheel. The knob and the clamp are tiny, not sure what its compatible with maybe a kids go cart
customer_reviews.author: Cole Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, fits like a glove, 2 seconds to pop on. For this price I should habe bought 4 :)

customer_reviews.title: Photo is a bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as it was represented except for the size of the ball portion. It was quite a lot smaller than depicted in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: IndyMike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very sturdy. Great addition to our boat. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very sturdy. Great addition to our boat. Easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: if i only read the reviews i would have saved time and moeny.
customer_reviews.text: its not for boat steering its to small bad advertising stop selling this item this will cause me not to order on line.

customer_reviews.title: BOATERS BEST FRIEND
customer_reviews.text: Makes docking and undocking much more manageable as you can rip on your helm with ease!

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: Had sharp edges that I had to take off with a grinder that would cut your hand and pinched it. Not sure why the design changed from the first time I bought this item, would not recommend!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall H. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap and it doesn't like to stay clamped to the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless knop
customer_reviews.text: Install on my boat steering. It fit just like make for my boat.
customer_reviews.author: trung tran

product_meta.title: AISI 316 Stainless Steel Boat Steering Wheel Knob, Steering Wheel Maneuvering Knob
product_meta.description:
AISI 316 Stainless Steel Boat Steering Wheel Knob, Steering Wheel Maneuvering Knob

FEATURES:

Made of Marine Grade Aisi 316 Stainless Steel
Corrosion resistant and durable
Rotate 360 degrees smoothly
Equipped with a wrench
Fits most steering wheels with rim dia. from 5/8" to 1"

SPECIFICATIONS:

Material: AISI 316 stainless steel
Knob Ball Size: 2.6 X 1.4”(65mm x 35mm)
Wrench Size:1.8 X 1”（45mm x 25mm）
Package Weight: 182g/6.4oz

PACKING INCLUDES:

1 x Stainless Steel Marine Knob
1 x Wrench

WARNING :

The mounting clamp is designed for an oval ring bar. if your wheel is round stock, you could reshaped the lower piece slightly with two pairs of pliers. 
May fit perfectly and works great.
This steering wheel knob is designed for the boat steering wheel, and please check the size and buy it with caution if used elsewhere.
If have any problems or want to return, please feel free to contact us first, and we will respond any question about product 
within 24 hours and help you to resolve the problems ASAP.
feature_bullets: Material: Marine Grade Aisi 316 Stainless Steel
Fits Steering Wheels with Rim Dia. from 5/8" to 1" （Please check the your Steering wheel Rim Dia. before purchase）
Package Included: 1 Marine Boat Steering Wheel Knob, 1 Small Wrench
The mounting clamp is designed for an oval ring bar. if your wheel is round stock, you could reshaped the lower piece slightly with two pairs of pliers.
